title: Miser's Purse, early 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic beads
Technique: beaded netting
description: Very fine netted silk in red and blue with ornament of fine gold beads in diamond pattern; side opening; wide gold rings slide to open or close.  Long tassels of gold beads at either end.

tombstone.epitaph:
Miser's Purse, early 19th century.
early 19th century. Medium: silk, metallic beads
Technique: beaded netting. Gift of Mrs. Albert Blum. 1953-106-60.
